spirit:field.spirit:name: cfg_pfc_sel
spirit:field.spirit:description: Select between Priority Flow control vs Standard Flow Control

spirit:field.spirit:name: cfg_rx_high_th
spirit:field.spirit:description: cfg_rx_high_th[Q] => Sets the high threshold for RX-Queue. Value is calculated as cfg_rx_high_th[Q] * 128. Tx_pfc/pause is asserted if fill level is >= this value

spirit:field.spirit:name: cfg_rx_low_th
spirit:field.spirit:description: cfg_rx_low_th[Q] => Sets the low threshold for RX-Queue. Value is calculated as cfg_rx_low_th[Q] * 128. Tx_pfc/pause is de-asserted if fill level is < this value

spirit:field.spirit:name: cfg_rx_high_th
spirit:field.spirit:description: cfg_rx_high_th[Q] => Sets the high threshold for RX-Queue. Value is calculated as cfg_rx_high_th[Q] * 128. Tx_pfc/pause is asserted if fill level is >= this value

spirit:field.spirit:name: cfg_rx_low_th
spirit:field.spirit:description: cfg_rx_low_th[Q] => Sets the low threshold for RX-Queue. Value is calculated as cfg_rx_low_th[Q] * 128. Tx_pfc/pause is de-asserted if fill level is < this value
